resources.string: You need to grant S20 Refresh Rate the WRITE_SECURE_SETTINGS permission. This can be done with the adb tool. Visit or share the link below for instructions.
S20 Refresh Rate uses an accessibility service to monitor when an app enters the foreground. Please enable the S20 Refresh Rate accessibility service
Tap here to restart app after granting permissions
S20 Refresh Rate monitors the currently running app to change the display refresh rate per user settings
